actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide coverage under the Federal old-age, survivors, and disability insurance system for all Members of Congress and other officers and employees in the legislative branch of the Government.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code and title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to include within the coverage of such program all Members of Congress and officers and employees in the legislative branch of the Government.

titles.title: A bill to provide coverage under the Federal old-age, survivors, and disability insurance system for all Members of Congress and other officers and employees in the legislative branch of the Government.
